data: {"generalSituation":"A cold front will move across the coastal areas of southern China tomorrow morning. Winds will strengthen gradually over the region. Temperatures will fall appreciably at night. Under the influence of the northeast monsoon associated with the cold front, it will be windy on Sunday and Monday. The weather will be cold in the morning and at night over the inland areas. Under the persistent influence of the monsoon, it will remain cool in the morning over the coast of southern China midweek next week. Besides, Tropical Cyclone Penha will move across the vicinity of the central and southern parts of the Philippines today and tomorrow, and weaken gradually.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260207","week":"Saturday","forecastWind":"Light winds force 2, becoming northeast force 4 to 5, occasionally force 6 on high ground.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy. One or two light rain patches and relatively low visibility at first. Bright periods in the afternoon.
